previous.name: An Ascetic to Follow Behind on Almsround

segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo sammāsamādhiṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a mendicant who has five qualities can’t enter and remain in right immersion.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rūpānaṃ, akkhamo saddānaṃ, akkhamo gandhānaṃ, akkhamo rasānaṃ, akkhamo phoṭṭhabbānaṃ.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo sammāsamādhiṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
segments.en: A mendicant who has these five qualities can’t enter and remain in right immersion.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo sammāsamādhiṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
segments.en: A mendicant who has five qualities can enter and remain in right immersion.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti rūpānaṃ, khamo saddānaṃ, khamo gandhānaṃ, khamo rasānaṃ, khamo phoṭṭhabbānaṃ.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant can endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo sammāsamādhiṃ upasampajja viharitun”ti.
segments.en: A mendicant who has these five qualities can enter and remain in right immersion.”
